Shadowbite Strike.name: Shadowbite Strike
Shadowbite Strike.flavor: Just before you loose your attack, you whisper a word of power to make your enemy more vulnerable to your attacks and to cover yourself in a thin veil of darkness.
Shadowbite Strike.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Shadowbite Strike.attack: Strength vs. AC (main weapon and off-hand weapon), two attacks
Shadowbite Strike.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier + Charisma modifier damage per attack, and the target gains vulnerable 5 to your attacks until the end of your next turn.
Shadowbite Strike.effect: You gain concealment until the start of your next turn.

Wings of Devilry.name: Wings of Devilry
Wings of Devilry.flavor: You surge aloft on tattered, leathery wings. When you land, they dissolve into foul-smelling smoke.
Wings of Devilry.effect: You fly a number of squares equal to your speed and must land at the end of this movement. You then gain concealment until the end of your next turn.

Balefire Scourge.name: Balefire Scourge
Balefire Scourge.flavor: With a word of power, infernal flames erupt all over your weapons, lending fire and speed to your attacks.
Balefire Scourge.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Balefire Scourge.target: Each enemy in the burst you can see
Balefire Scourge.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target takes ongoing 10 fire damage and loses any fire resistance or immunity (save ends both).
Balefire Scourge.effect: You gain concealment until the end of your next turn.
